context_bundle.summary: Zipkin: Distributed tracing system (originally Twitter). Simpler than Jaeger. Key features: trace collection, dependency analysis, latency histograms, B3 propagation headers. Backends: in-memory, MySQL, Cassandra, Elasticsearch. Good for Spring Cloud Sleuth integration.

onboarding.quick_start: Zipkin: 1) docker run -p 9411:9411 openzipkin/zipkin, 2) Instrument app (Spring Sleuth auto-configures), 3) Configure zipkin.baseUrl in app, 4) View traces at :9411, 5) Analyze service dependencies.
common_patterns: B3 headers: X-B3-TraceId, X-B3-SpanId, X-B3-ParentSpanId, X-B3-Sampled
Spring Sleuth: Auto-instruments Spring apps, exports to Zipkin
Brave: Java tracing library compatible with Zipkin
Lens: Browser extension for visualizing traces

known_errors.cause: B3 headers not propagated through HTTP client
known_errors.solution: Use instrumented HTTP client (RestTemplate, WebClient with Sleuth)
known_errors.prevention: Verify all services propagate trace context headers
